Class BinaryTree<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • BinaryTree<E>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BinarySearchTree

    public class BinaryTree<E>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class for a binary tree that stores type E objects.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • readBinaryTree

        public static BinaryTree<java.lang.String> readBinaryTree(java.io.BufferedReader bR)
                                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Method to read a binary tree. pre: The input consists of a preorder traversal of the binary tree. The line "null" indicates a null tree.
        Parameters:
        bR - The input file
        Returns:
        The binary tree
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is an input error
